Question.Subject: LiveJournal: What's the difference between joining a community and watching a community?
Question.Content: I'm pretty new to LiveJournal and I'm just wondering what the difference is between joining a community and simply watching it? Do you have to be active in the community for a while before joining it? Thanks in anticipation =]
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I'm not absolutely sure; but if you can now watch(?), it would seem you don't have to join. By being active if you mean to "post" on it, I would certainly think it mandatory that you join.
I use to be a member of several Yahoo Groups; but ultimately withdrew from them all. The only one I found really interesting, I can still read all the latest postings; but not post anything myself(really don't want to).
Probably not much of an answer; but have starred your question,
Alberich
